data.name: Nakiti Generations
data.detailed_description:
It's the year 2120 where living on an orbital station around the earth has become a reality, home to more than 200 people with regular travel between planet earth and the station itself, HORIZON has become bigger and more popular then anyone had ever planned.

In Nakiti Generations you play as a heroine who has been caught in a huge disaster aboard the station that takes you crashing on to an uncharted world, are you the only survivor?
data.about_the_game:
It's the year 2120 where living on an orbital station around the earth has become a reality, home to more than 200 people with regular travel between planet earth and the station itself, HORIZON has become bigger and more popular then anyone had ever planned.

In Nakiti Generations you play as a heroine who has been caught in a huge disaster aboard the station that takes you crashing on to an uncharted world, are you the only survivor?
data.short_description: 2D action adventure game set in the far future on a mysterious abandoned planet with yourself as the only survivor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.0 ghz or greater
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low spec windows tablets will have performance issues.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: i3 or newer
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
